data.message:
Great! Here's a suggested itinerary for your 7-day trip to Bandung:

Day 1:
- Arrive at Husein Sastranegara International Airport
- Check-in at your hotel
- Visit Tangkuban Perahu volcano to enjoy the scenic beauty of the active volcano
- Try traditional Sundanese food for lunch at "Kampung Daun" restaurant
- Visit Dago Pakar area for the amazing view of Bandung city from the hills

Day 2:
- Visit Kawah Putih, an impressive white crater lake located in Ciwidey area
- Have a lunch at floating market in Lembang area
- Visit the famous tea plantations in Ciwidey area
- Back to hotel

Day 3:
- Visit the beautiful Maribaya waterfall and hot springs
- Explore the amazing trees at Treetop Adventure Park
- Have a lunch at a local restaurant near the area
- Visit the stunning Glamping Lakeside in Situ Cileunca

Day 4:
- Visit the Tangkuban Parahu volcano again, but this time take a different route through Lembang
- Have a lunch at "The Peak" restaurant with a panoramic view of Bandung city
- Visit the Instagenic European-style Castle, "Gedung Sate"

Day 5:
- Visit the amazing Trans Studio Bandung, a theme park with indoor and outdoor rides
- Have lunch at the theme park's restaurants
- Visit the Paris Van Java shopping mall for a shopping spree

Day 6:
- Relax at the Jendela Alam Farm in Lembang and take photos with the farm animals
- Have lunch at a local restaurant near the area
- Visit the Rabbit town, a park with various types of rabbits

Day 7:
- Visit the Cihampelas Walk shopping street, famous for its jeans and fashion shops
- Have lunch at a local restaurant near the area
- Check-out from your hotel and head to the airport for your flight back home

Recommended hotels:
data.trailing_message: I hope you enjoy your trip!
